EmailTemplate.name: Swift Resume Mask Write for Layer
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: {!Mask_Set_Title__c.Name} Resume Mask Write
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mask Set Title: <MRS.Mask Set Title> Mask Layer: <MRS.Mask Layer> ________________________________________ Dear Sir/Madam,
Please note that <User_Name> (<User_ID>) has resumed mask write for the layer(s) <MRS.Mask Layer> .
Reason to Resume for Mask Write: <Reason>
This is a system generated message, please do not reply. Best Regards.
